about.title: 👨‍💻 Full Stack Developer  🐧 Linux Enthusiast  🚀 Self-Directed Learner
about.experience: 🚀 Extensive expertise in Node.js, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js. 🧪 Specialized in automated testing with Vitest. 💡 Proficient in TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. 📊 Solid understanding of relational and non-relational databases, primarily MongoDB. 📂 Strong knowledge of version control with Git, GitHub, and GitLab. 🌐 Experience in managing Linux systems for the web, including Nginx configuration.
about.learner: I'm a dedicated self-learner, always eager to grasp new technologies and approaches. My ability to learn quickly enables me to keep up with the ever-evolving trends in the tech world.
